job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Contribute to the development of GenAI services that are integral to our product offerings and user experiences.
     * Implement coding best practices to foster code modularity, reusability, and maintainability, enabling our AI services to remain flexible for future advancements.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem, ensuring a smooth developer experience.
     * Assess and optimize existing AI services to enhance performance and conform to the latest industry trends.
     * Support and mentor other engineers, contributing to a culture that values technical skill and code quality.
     * Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services.
job_details.full_text:
Software Engineer - GenAI Platform Development

* Contribute to the development of GenAI services that are integral to our product offerings and user experiences.
     * Implement coding best practices to foster code modularity, reusability, and maintainability, enabling our AI services to remain flexible for future advancements.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem, ensuring a smooth developer experience.
     * Assess and optimize existing AI services to enhance performance and conform to the latest industry trends.
     * Support and mentor other engineers, contributing to a culture that values technical skill and code quality.
     * Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development, integration, and optimization of GenAI services, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. Phrases like 'development of GenAI services', 'integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem', and 'optimize existing AI services' directly point to this profile. The focus is on building and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems powered by generative AI, rather than solely on predictive modeling or data engineering.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Contribute to the development of GenAI services that are integral to our product offerings and user experiences' indicates building software applications that incorporate GenAI.
job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the development of GenAI services that are integral to our product offerings and user experiences

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Implement coding best practices to foster code modularity, reusability, and maintainability' describes core software engineering principles applied to AI services.
job_tasks.phrase: Implement coding best practices to foster code modularity, reusability, and maintainability

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem' implies understanding how AI services fit into the broader product and business context.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Assess and optimize existing AI services' suggests working with and improving AI models or services.
job_tasks.phrase: Assess and optimize existing AI services

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'ensuring a smooth developer experience' relates to the usability and integration of the developed AI services within the product ecosystem.
The phrase 'optimize existing AI services to enhance performance' can include aspects of performance tuning and maintenance in a production environment, which falls under MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: optimize existing AI services to enhance performance

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Support and mentor other engineers' directly relates to interpersonal and team-building skills.
The phrase 'Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services' highlights the need for continuous learning and adaptation.
job_tasks.phrase: Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services
